member.name: T:Ixxat.Vci4.VciServer
member.summary: This class represents the entry point for working with the VCI. Use Instance to get access to the VCI server singleton.

member.name: M:Ixxat.Vci4.VciServer.GetArchitecture(Ixxat.Vci4.VciServer.SYSTEM_INFO@)
member.summary: Turn content of system info into arch enumeration

member.name: M:Ixxat.Vci4.VciServer.LoadServer(System.String)
member.summary:
Dynamically loads the platform dependent (x86, x64) server component.
You could either specify - no path or relative path -> try to load relative to EXE and second try relative to Loader DLL - absolute path -> try to load from given path

member.name: M:Ixxat.Vci4.VciServer.Instance
member.remarks: Path to mixed assemblies is automatically determined from the EXE or the Loader assembly.

member.name: M:Ixxat.Vci4.VciServer.Instance(System.String)
member.param: specify path where to load the necessary mixed assemblies from (vcinet.x64.dll, vcinet.x86.dll)
